channel.title: Blog on Taubin Drinks Beer
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Taubin Drinks Beer

item.title: Blog changes
item.author: admin@taubindrinks.beer (Dustin Plunkett)
item.description: Blog changes I’m making some changes to the blog, and moving it from wordpress to Hugo. There are many techinical reasons for this, which I will get to on my personal blog In the meantime, I need to change the posts so they are able to be posted properly in markdown format. The old posts and pages will be back, I promise. I will get them up as soon as I can, in the meantime if you have any questions or are looking for any of the old recipes, please email me at taubin at taubindrinks.
